# gitea_gpg_key (Resource)

Manages a user's GPG key for signing commits



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `armored_public_key` (String) An armored GPG key to add

### Read-Only

- `can_certify` (Boolean) Whether the key can certify
- `can_encrypt_comms` (Boolean) Whether the key can encrypt communications
- `can_encrypt_storage` (Boolean) Whether the key can encrypt storage
- `can_sign` (Boolean) Whether the key can sign
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the key was created
- `expires_at` (String) Timestamp when the key expires
- `id` (Number) The ID of the GPG key
- `key_id` (String) Key ID
- `primary_key_id` (String) Primary key ID
